Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.communication

Interface NotificationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
NotificationServiceImpl
public interface NotificationService
Service interface for managing notifications in the HRMS.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • sendNotification

      Notification sendNotification(Employee employee, String message)
      Sends a notification to an employee.
      Parameters:
      employee - the employee to whom the notification is sent
      message - the notification message
      Returns:
      the created notification
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the employee is not found

    • getNotification

      Notification getNotification(UUID notificationID)
      Retrieves a notification by its ID.
      Parameters:
      notificationID - the ID of the notification
      Returns:
      the notification
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the notification is not found

    • getNotificationsByEmployee

      List<Notification> getNotificationsByEmployee(Employee employee)
      Retrieves all notifications for an employee.
      Parameters:
      employee - the employee for whom to retrieve notifications
      Returns:
      the list of notifications
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the employee is not found

    • markNotificationAsRead

      void markNotificationAsRead(UUID notificationID)
      Marks a notification as read.
      Parameters:
      notificationID - the ID of the notification
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the notification is not found

    • deleteNotification

      void deleteNotification(UUID notificationID)
      Deletes a notification.
      Parameters:
      notificationID - the ID of the notification
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the notification is not found
